archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.9.5c: c) maintaining a limited number of identity stores/services(i.e. the location where User ID and authentication information is stored, such as a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) directory service, Microsoft Active Directory (AD), or an identity as a service (IDaaS) product)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
